name: Vermilion Prison
description:
Information:

Vermilion Prison is a 2D top-down shooter in which every time 20 seconds pass a new event will happen. Events vary from window resize to reversed controls and many more (you need to play it to find out the rest).

Controls: Movement: 

WASD keys or the ARROW keys

Shooting: 

Left Mouse Button

Pause: 

Escape key

FAQ: 1) My antivirus detects this game. It this a virus? 

No, It's really not. The game messes with things like the game window so that's why.

Here's the VirusTotal scan if you still don't believe me .

2) I got the same event 2, 3, 4... times in a row

The events system is fully based on RNG. That's why an event can happen multiple time in a row. Is improbable to happen more then 3 times but it's still possible.

3) Why can't I play in fullscreen?

Short answer: because of the way the game was made (maybe I will fix this in the future)

4) Why didn't you build a web version?

The game couldn't work if it was web based. If you play it you'll understand why.
